title: Another Yamal show for Barcelona in win at Elche in La Liga
desc: Lamine Yamal put on another show as he scored Barcelona’s opener and tormented defenders all game long to spearhead the La Liga leader to a 3-1 win at Elche on Saturday. Yamal scored in the sixth minute and passed for Marcus Rashford to put the victory beyond doubt late in the second half. Elche pulled level briefly in the first half before Ferran Torres re-established a 2-1 advantage just before halftime at Martínez Valero Stadium.

title: Hugo Ekitike scores twice as Liverpool come from behind to beat Newcastle 4
desc: Liverpool came from behind to beat Newcastle United 4-1 at Anfield. Hugo Ekitike (two), Florian Wirtz and Ibrahima Konate got the goals. Match report...

title: Liverpool player ratings vs Newcastle: The Hugo Ekitike and Florian Wirtz show! Summer signings fire Reds past Newcastle after Anthony Gordon opener
desc: Wirtz and Ekitike stepped up for Arne Slot as the big-money summer signings helped fire Liverpool to a comeback victory against Newcastle. When the Magpies took a deserved lead, the French forward took the game by the scruff of the neck and scored a quickfire brace to flip it on its head. The Reds then pressed home their advantage and ran out worthy 4-1 winners.

title: Second Epstein victim claims she was sent to UK for sex with Andrew, lawyer says

title: north coast attraction Timbertown
desc: Thousands of tourists and students on school excursions passed through the doors of the heritage village to get an idea of what life was like for Australia's colonial-era timber-getters.

title: Should You Buy Shares of Intuitive Surgical In February?
desc: Intuitive Surgical's 2025 earnings were strong, and the future remains bright, with valuation as the only big concern for investors.
